atae/durkatlimmu/X660048
NA₄.KIŠIB {m}{d}IM-PAP-AŠ A {m}u-za-bu-ru-un-du Bel ARAD SUM-an   {m}DUG₃.GA-PAP.MEŠ ARAD-šu₂ u₂-piš-ma {m}DI-mu-LUGAL A {m}{d}AMAR.UTU-LUGAL-PAP ina ŠA₃-bi 1/2 MA.NA KU₃.BABBAR ša URU.gar-ga-mes il-qe₂ kas-pi gam-mur ta-din ARAD šu-a-tu₂ za-rip la-qe₂ tu-a-ru de-ni DUG₄.DUG₄ la-aš₂-šu₂ man-nu ša ina ur-keš ina ma-te-ma i-za-qu-pa-an-ni ša de-ni DUG₄.DUG₄ TA {m}DI-mu-LUGAL u₃ DUMU.MEŠ-šu₂ u₃ DUMU-DUMU.MEŠ-šu₂ ub-ta-ʾu-u₂-ni 10 MA.NA KU₃.BABBAR 2 MA.NA KU₃.GI a-na Adad i-dan kas-pi a-na 10.MEŠ-te a-na EN.MEŠ-šu₂ u₂-ta-ra ina de-ni-šu₂ DUG₄.DUG₄-ma la i-laq-qe₂  IGI {m}re-eš-u-a-a A {m}EN-PAP.MEŠ IGI {m}10-še-zib A {m}ab-di-10 IGI {m}AMAR-EN-PAP A {m}tukul-tu₂-LUGAL IGI {m}ha-am-DINGIR A {m}AMAR-I LU₂.qur-ZAG ša Ninua IGI {m}ha-za-la A {m}bi-ru-qu IGI {m}AŠ-PAP.MEŠ A {m}man-nu-ki-arba-il₃ IGI {m}10-ta-qan LU₂.A-SIG ša DUMU-LUGAL IGI {m}AMAR-ta-bi A {m}{d}MAŠ-PAP ITU.ZIZ₂ lim-me {m}PAP-DINGIR-a-a ʾgrt nzrʾ br x
